modName: Schematics Parts From Scrapping Schematics and Perk Books
modShortDescription: Inspired from Ravenhearst and Darkness Falls, where you can scrap the schematics, Scomar made this mod for vanilla game to use similar mechanic.
modDescription:
Inspired from [Ravenhearst](https://7daystodiemods.com/ravenhearst-mod/) and [Darkness Falls](https://7daystodiemods.com/darkness-falls-mod/), where you can scrap the schematics, Scomar made this mod for vanilla game to use similar mechanic.

Put an end to the eternal search for a missing book in a series, simply disassemble the schematics and [books](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-books/) you have already learned. With the corresponding number of SchematicParts you can then craft the missing book yourself.

All schematics and [skill books](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-skill-points/) as well as quest papers can be disassembled into schematic parts. With these parts as well as a ruler, pencil and paper, which can be found in loot, you can craft the schematics and skill books yourself. Furthermore, 3 mission books can also be crafted from this parts. They will give you a killing [quest](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-quests/) to finish for a reward.

## Changelog

**v1.1:** Added a crafting-timer to reduce crafting time.

## Installation Notes

7 Days in Version 19.4 or higher â€“ Supported languages: English, German

Just unzip the archive into the Mods folder of 7 Days. Example:(your drive:\\steamapps\\common\\7 Days To Die\\Mods)

**[Download](https://github.com/Scomar82/7-Days-Modlets/raw/master/Scomar82_SchematicParts.zip)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/24371-schematicsparts-from-scrapping-schematics-and-perkbooks/).

**Credits:** [Scomar](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/scomar/)
